attributes.action: introduce a national Vaccination Programme for Foot and Mouth Disease immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to VACCINATE NOW
     AGAINST FOOT AND MOUTH DISEASE

     DEFRA manufactures and supplies Foot and Mouth Disease vaccine
    for  the World, DEFRA can sequence the Virus and tell us where
     (which farm)it has come from to arrive in Surrey,it can do this
     in just a few weeks

     Do not repeat the collossal avoidable mistakes of 2001 
     VACINATE NOW, do not delay until it is too late to implement this simple remedy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
